title: CKA Lab: Updating the Control Plane
description: Learn how to safely upgrade a Kubernetes cluster using kubeadm, including updating kubeadm, the control-plane, kubelet, and kubectl while maintaining cluster stability.

steps.title: Connect to the control-plane and verify node status
Update kubeadm to the target version
Check upgrade plan and apply control-plane upgrade
Upgrade kubelet on the control-plane node
Upgrade kubectl to match the cluster version
